sources.title: Shackled | Full Movie | Survival Thriller | Jennifer Ball
sources.description:
Shackled - Chained to a pickup truck in the Californian desert, a young woman must unravel her captor's twisted scheme, before she is undone herself.
2023.  Stars: Jennifer Ball, Monique Rosario, Gary Best, Tyler Cole

metadata.Plot: Held captive by a circus, Malu is frantically rescued from her shackles by her husband. As she waits anxiously in the darkness for her chance to escape, a disturbing truth she's hidden away seeps back in.
